Package jakarta.jms

Interface XAQueueConnection

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Connection, QueueConnection, XAConnection
public interface XAQueueConnection extends XAConnection, QueueConnection
An XAQueueConnection provides the same create options as QueueConnection (optional). The only difference is that an XAConnection is by definition transacted.

The XAQueueConnection interface is optional. Jakarta Messaging providers are not required to support this interface. This interface is for use by Jakarta Messaging providers to support transactional environments. Client programs are strongly encouraged to use the transactional support available in their environment, rather than use these XA interfaces directly.

Since:
JMS 1.0
Version:
Jakarta Messaging 2.0
